    • getValue

      public T getValue​(java.lang.String ans) throws FormException
      Returns the value of the answer
      Parameters:
      ans - string of the answer, to be transformed by the field
      Returns:
      the converted value of ans
      Throws:
      FormException - if incorrect answer (InvalidFormatException or InvalidAnswerException)

      Parameters:
      predicate - predicate that the answer has to satisfy

      Returns:
      the field
